propositions.text: Protagonist is transported to a foreign world through mysterious forces
Protagonist awakens in a desolate area with no memory and physical weakness
Protagonist encounters danger in the form of distant roars
Protagonist meets Qianxue, a mysterious mage, during escape
Qianxue saves protagonist and warns of dangers in the Demon Realm
Protagonist and Qianxue face multiple dangers in the Demon Realm
They survive a beast attack and enter a forbidden area
Protagonist uncovers fragments of past memories in a forbidden area
Memories suggest a deep connection to the Demon Realm and Qianxue
Protagonist and Qianxue escape the forbidden area but face new threats
Qianxue is injured; protagonist awakens hidden power
Protagonist finds temporary refuge at Ye Manor
Manor is filled with intrigue and hidden tensions
Protagonist begins to understand and awaken inner power at Ye Manor
Power is both a gift and a curse, requiring control
A conspiracy targeting the protagonist emerges at Ye Manor
Tensions between Qianxue and the Manor Lord surface
Betrayal and separation occur as trust collapses
Protagonist and Qianxue are forced apart after an attack
Protagonist faces challenges alone after losing Qianxue's protection
New allies and enemies emerge; more memories are triggered

concepts.name: Protagonist
concepts.context: Central character experiencing memory loss and power awakening

concepts.name: Qianxue
concepts.context: Mysterious mage aiding protagonist, holds secrets

concepts.name: Conspiracy
concepts.context: Plot against protagonist involving multiple parties

hierarchy.structure: Linear narrative following protagonist's journey through danger, refuge, and self-discovery across multiple chapters
